author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Communication & Outreach
description: Meaningful participation requires an informed and engaged community however Project Catalyst's information flow is disorganized.
solution: Create a DAO, with sustained funding, to facilitate communication and participation between the community, DAOs, projects and teams.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
